full_summary:
=================

## Submersible Turbulence Instrument1 Tender

### Reference and Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: WS4407177544
* Solicitation Number: WS4407177544
* PWGSC Solicitation Reference Number: DOC4446949820
* Amendment Number: 0

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: March 4th, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 26th, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: August 30th, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired

### Description and Classification

* The purpose of this tender is to acquire a Submersible Turbulence Instrument1.
* Classification: Environmental Services
* UNSPSC Codes:
	+ 77000000 - Environmental Services
	+ 77100000 - Environmental management
	+ 77110000 - Environmental protection
	+ 77120000 - Pollution tracking and monitoring and rehabilitation
	+ 77130000 - Pollutants tracking and monitoring and rehabilitation services

### Procurement and Notification

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
* Selection Criteria: Not applicable

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### End-User Entity Information

* End-User Entity: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* End-User Entity Address: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 4C6, Canada

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Namasivayam, Kagetha (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: kagetha.namasivayam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

* The tender notice can be found on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18815399?extsite=MTg4MTUzOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 
* Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time has been disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March
